review: I love the small device and it streams very well most of the time.  However, I have been having issues with streaming my amazon prime??  Lots of stopping & starting ( i know this is not my internet connection, because Netflix etc. stream fine).  It is frustrating!  You would think that an amazon device would stream amazon shows a bit better!  Sometimes it works for 2-3 seconds, then stops and spins for a minute or more, the plays a couple seconds, then stops again!

review: Works great. Easy to use.  Great companion to Prime.Should be able to use power from TV.  Required power source is a bit cumbersome and limiting.

review: I was very impressed that such a small device could work so well.  It was very easy to set up and my daughter loves that she can use her phone as a remote.
author: Pam Friedman

review: I purchased this to see if it would perform better than the Roku 2 XS as it was constantly stopping and reloading. Roku said it was the internet and ATT said it was the Roku. The Fire TV Stick fired right up and has performed perfectly at half the price. It is fast and easy to use. I am planning to buy another one for the spare tv.
